text: The Horae were three goddesses in Greek mythology. There are in fact two different groups of goddesses which were known at different times: today they are called the first and second generation to distinguish between them. They were the children of Zeus and Themis. ==First Generation== The first Horae were goddesses of the seasons. They were: *Thallo (or Thalatte) *Auxo (or Auxesia) *Karpo (also Xarpo or Carpo) ==Second Generation== The second Horae were goddesses of order, justice and law. They were: *Dike *Eunomia *Eirene (or Irene) Category:Greek gods and goddesses
title: Horae
